casebody.data:
Lawrence RUSSELL, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
CITY OF DETROIT, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156791
COA: 332934 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 1, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 10, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.

BERNSTEIN , J., did not participate because he has a family member with an interest that could be affected by the proceeding.
